articles.title: Battlefield 6 To Feature NVIDIA DLSS, AMD FSR & Intel XeSS Support On PC - Wccftech
articles.description: Battlefield 6, the upcoming blockbuster FPS from EA, will feature support for NVIDIA's DLSS, AMD FSR & Intel XeSS technologies on PC.
articles.content:
Battlefield 6, the upcoming blockbuster FPS from EA, will feature support for NVIDIA's DLSS, AMD FSR & Intel XeSS technologies on PC.
